fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose three targets. At night, you may choose to either:
> - Transport them (1 -> 2, 2 -> 3, 3 -> 1)
> - Roleblock them
> - Redirect them all to a player of your choice.
> - Kill them (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not target yourself, but you may redirect targets to yourself.
- You have Invincible defense on nights divisible by three.
- If there are less than three valid targets, you may not perform any abilities.
- Roleblock and redirect immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.
